installation.script:
echo "Install S1X debian linux" 

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update -y
apt-get install wine wine32 unzip git screen mono-devel curl wget -y

echo "### Downloading S1X ###"
export HOME=/mnt/server
wget -P /mnt/server/ ${SERVER_DOWNLOAD}
cd /mnt/server && unzip -o s1x.zip
cd /mnt/server && rm s1x.zip

echo "Downloading S1X Configs"
cd /mnt/server && git clone https://git.alterware.dev/AlterWare/S1ServerConfigs.git
cd /mnt/server && mv S1ServerConfigs/* .
cd /mnt/server && rm -R S1ServerConfigs

echo "### NEW: Downloading Alterware launcher ###"
cd /mnt/server && curl https://api.github.com/repos/alterware/alterware-launcher/releases/latest | grep "browser_download_url.*x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz" | cut -d : -f 2,3 | tr -d \" | wget -qi -
alterware=$(find alterware-launcher*)
cd /mnt/server && tar -xvf ${alterware}
cd /mnt/server && rm ${alterware}
cd /mnt/server && chmod 755 alterware-launcher
echo "### NEW: Running Alterware launcher to update files ###"
cd /mnt/server
./alterware-launcher --update --bonus s1-mod
